title: The itel P38 Brings Fast Charging to the African Market at Under $100
content:
You might not know that itel is a globally leading smartphone brand under $100 according to IDC Worldwide Mobile Phone Tracker of 2022. They are responsible for bringing some of the best smartphone technology to the African market, at prices that are easily affordable. With a large selection of devices, itel is able to provide
